1.content: Analyze Current Portal Architecture & Authentication Systems
1.details:
Document the existing authentication systems across all portals:
1. Couples Portal: Dual auth (Wedding Code + Email/Password)
2. Admin Portal: Enterprise admin system with AI analytics
3. Groomsmen Portal: Invitation code-based access
4. User Profile System: Supabase Auth with profile/size data
Identify integration points and potential conflicts.

2.details:
Create architecture for unified user accounts:
1. Extend existing Supabase Auth to work with invitation codes
2. Map wedding codes to Supabase user accounts
3. Ensure profile/size data flows seamlessly across all portals
4. Maintain existing portal UX while adding unified backend
5. Create authentication middleware for portal-specific access

3.details:
Build Supabase Edge Functions to bridge authentication systems:
1. Wedding code validation service
2. Invitation code mapping service
3. Profile data sync service
4. Session management across portals
5. User migration utilities for existing accounts

4.content: Enhance Database Schema for Wedding Integration
4.details:
Extend user_profiles table and add wedding-specific tables:
1. Add wedding_party_members table
2. Add invitation_codes table
3. Add wedding_events table
4. Update user_profiles with wedding-specific fields
5. Create data migration scripts

5.details:
Modify couples portal to integrate with unified auth:
1. Connect wedding code validation to Supabase
2. Ensure existing email/password login works with unified system
3. Add profile data access to couples experience
4. Test seamless login flow

6.details:
Enhance groomsmen portal to work with unified auth:
1. Connect invitation code system to Supabase
2. Auto-create/link user profiles when accessing with codes
3. Make profile/size data available within groomsmen experience
4. Maintain existing secure invitation flow

7.content: Connect Admin Portal to Unified System
7.details:
Link admin portal with unified user management:
1. Add user profile management to admin interface
2. Connect wedding management to unified user data
3. Add invitation code generation/management
4. Create admin tools for wedding party setup

8.details:
Comprehensive testing of unified system:
1. Test cross-portal authentication flows
2. Verify profile data sync across all portals
3. Test invitation code generation and redemption
4. Validate admin portal wedding management
5. Performance testing under load
6. Security audit of authentication bridge

9.details:
